Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: This phone is absolutely horrible! As soon as I turned it on it said DEMON in bright red letters, it's runs terribly slow and I'm just not satisfied with it at all. I thought at first it was the samsung galaxy s4 because it looks EXACTLY like it, but it's just a shitty knock off. This phone is terrible. It took a good 10 seconds to show the word I typed out, need two SIM cards to run it & the battery is shit. I will never buy something off the internet ever again. If I cannot buy it in an actual store, I will not buy it.

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: ThatNewOrleansBoy
Reviews.Content: The phone had demon on it as soon as u turn it on and runs really slow but overall its an okay phon p.s it needs two sim cards
